question: You answered my question about Danny trying to contact Oli thank you. Yes please could you write Danny turning up at the nursery. I love s bit of angst!
answer:
Anonymous: Please write about Danny going to the nursery! I’d love to read that

I know this was ages ago, but it’s longer than I expected it to be so maybe that makes up for it? Probably not, but enjoy it anyway xxx 

Master Post 

Best Friend Harry Requests

Tuesday July 16th 2019 - 18 Months Old.

Danny walked into the nursery that his son attended, wearing a button up shirt and smart pants. He knew that there was a court order that said he couldn’t have any contact with Oliver, but he didn’t think that the nursery staff would know that. He straightened his shirt and opened the door to the nursery room, to be greeted by an older lady putting things away in the children’s bags.

“Hi Sir” she said “can I help you?”

“Yes, I’m here to pick up Oliver”

She looked him up and down sternly, “Oliver’s mum said his dad would be picking him up this afternoon”

A smile spread across Danny’s face “I’m his dad” he said proudly

The lady grew even more confused with that statement “I’ve met Oliver’s dad before sir, are you on his contact list?” She finished putting things in bags and turned to face Danny directly

“I should be” he lied, knowing perfectly well that he wasn’t

“Ok, I’ll just check that before I take you through” she smiled “what’s your name?”

“Daniel Watts”

She frowned not recognising the name “I’ll have to ask you to wait here while I check” she turned around and exited the room, making her way towards the play room where they kept the information of all the children’s contacts in an easily accessible file.

“What’s going on?” Sarah, one of the other educators asked

“Oli’s real dad is here and I’m not sure y/n or Harry know anything about it” Margaret grimaced

“I’m sure they have a court order against him” Bonnie added

Margaret read down Oli’s list of contacts seeing only yourself, Harry and Gemma on there.

“Well he’s not in the list” she frowned and looked around the room for oli “where is oli?” She asked the two other girls

“He’s still asleep” Bonnie added

“Ok, can you keep an eye on him while I go and talk to this man, and Sarah, do you mind giving y/n a call and telling her what’s going on?”

They both nodded and Margaret handed Sarah the contact list so that she could find your number

“Y/N said this morning when she dropped him off to call Harry if we needed anything” Bonnie said, she was only the early shift, which meant that she had taken messages from all the parents that day.

“Ok, call Harry then, but first call out to reception and let Clara know what going on so she can give me a hand, I have a feeling he won’t leave easily”

Clara was the manager of the centre and was the best person to turn to in these situations, so Sarah dialled the extension that connected to the front office and asked Clara to come into the babies room to help out. Once she’s done that, Margaret went back out into the locker room to confront him.

“Mr Watts” she smiled, closing the door behind her “I’m afraid you’re not on Oliver’s contact list, so I can’t let you take him today”

“That’s bullshit” he yelled “he’s my son”

“I’ll ask that you keep your voice down sir, we have babies that are still asleep” Clara said walking into the room.

“He’s my son and I won’t be leaving without him” Danny said firmly

“We have one of other staff  members on the phone to his dad-”

“Step-dad” Danny interrupted

Margaret drew her lips into a sharp line “if he doesn’t give the ok for you to take oli than I will have to ask you to leave”

“I will not be leaving, that prick has no right to my son”

“Mr Watts” Clara said, making him focus on her “I’m going to ask that you step into my office, while we wait for Mr Styles to be contacted, I can’t have you waiting here like this”

“Mr Styles” he said with fire in his voice “has no right to be contacted”

“According to our files, Mr Styles is Oliver’s legal guardian, there’s a note in his file that says you have no legal rights to to him, so while we’re on the in the phone to his legal guardian I’ll ask that  you step  outside” Clara said ushering him out the door. He obliged, knowing that she had every right to have him removed from the premises if he didn’t do as he was asked.

***

“Hello” Harry said into the his phone as he ducked out of the studio

“Hi Harry, it’s Sarah here from Oliver’s nursery”

“Hi Sarah, is everything ok?”

“Oli’s fine, he’s still having his nap, but we’re having a situation here”

“Okayyy” Harry said confused “what’s going on?”

“We have a Mr Daniel Watts here, trying to to pick Oli up, we haven’t allowed him into the play room, but he’s refusing to leave”

“Shit” he said with a sense of urgency in his voice “he’s Oli’s biological dad, but he we’ve got a court order against him, he’s not allowed any contact”

“That’s what we thought”

“I’ll come in and get Oli”

“Alright, we’ll try and wake him up, thank you Harry”

“No problem, see you soon” he hung up the phone and quickly walked back to the studio to get his things.

“I have to go” he said darkly, unable to focus on anything else. He trusted the nursery to keep Oli safe, but he didn’t trust Danny to leave before he got his way. The car was parked in a side street a block away but the nursery was a block away in the other direction, so he lifted his hoodie up over his head and began jogging toward his sons school. At this point, he was glad that he’d been training hard in the gym, and as the nursery appeared in view he slowed down to a walk, composing himself before he walked him.

“Mr Styles” Clara said with a smile on her face “thank you for coming on such short notice”

“No problem” he smiled back

“Mr Watts is in my office if you’d like to speak to him.”

Harry could tell by the tone of her voice that she needed the extra help to try and get him to leave.

“Of course” he followed her into the office, thinking that it would be best to talk to him without Oli around.

“Harry” Danny said, taking a step toward him

“Mr Watts” Harry said, reaching out to shake his hand, meeting his eyes with a sharp stare “What are you doing here?”

“I’m here to pick up my son”

“He’s not your son until he’s two and you file for parental rights again, and I don’t believe this little incident will look good on your record, and trust me” Harry smirked “it will be on your record, because as soon as I get Oli home I’ll be calling my lawyers”

“Once he turns two they’ll have no choice but to grant me parental rights” Danny added in a snarky tone

“Mr Watts,” Clara interpreted the two of them, aware of the commotion it was causing “since Mr Styles here has made it clear that you are not legally allowed contact with Oliver, I’m going to have to ask you to leave the premises”

“I’m not going until I see my son” Danny stood his ground.

“Well I’ll have to call the police then” she picked up the phone and dialled the number of the local police, watching as Danny remained still in his place. Harry shook his head at the idiocy Danny was displaying, but remained quietly hopeful that it would mean that He would be able to officially adopt Oli sooner than he thought.

“They’re on their way to escort you off the premises” Clara said hanging up the phone and walked towards the door, ushering Harry out as she left Danny standing frozen in his spot.

“Thank you” Harry said as she closed the door behind her

“No problem Harry” she smiled and rested her hand on his shoulder “it’s my job, you go get your son”

He nodded “I’ll stick around until the police get here, in case he causes anymore trouble” he smirked “and so I can watch him get escorted away”

She laughed “I’ll keep you posted, they said they’d only be about five minutes”

Harry nodded and turned and walked into the babies room to find Margaret and Sarah gathered around the door, trying to eavesdrop on what was going on.

“Hello ladies” Harry said, cheeky smile spread across his face

“Hi Harry” Margaret said “everything ok out there?”

“Yep, police are on their way to escort him away from the area”

“Police!?” Thats intense” Sarah said, sounding concerned

“He’s refusing to leave” Harry shrugged “not the best idea if you ask me, our court order runs out when ol turns two and he can file again, but with attempted kidnaping to his name that’s not going to end well.” Now that he knew that Oli was safe, Harry found the whole situation quite funny.

“Oli’s better off with you, we can all testify to that” Margaret said

“Thanks” Harry smiled “where is the little man?”

“Bonnie’s still trying to wake up” Sarah gestured towards the room where he was still sleeping soundly.

“Can I go into the cot room?” Harry asked

Margaret checked the chart outside the door “Of course, but there’s a few others in there, so keep it down, we need them to sleep longer” she smiled

Harry slid the door open and saw Bonnie gently trying to wake Oliver from his sleep.

“He’s hard to wake” Harry said softly, walking towards his cot “Oli,” he cooed “daddy’s here to take you home”

He stirred slightly at the sound of Harry’s voice, but remained asleep. Not wanting to miss Danny being escorted away, Harry took down the side of the cot and gently lifted him up into his arms, allowing him to rest his head on his shoulder and remain asleep.

“Is he back tomorrow?” Bonnie asked before she took the sheets from his bed

“Normally yes” Harry said softly “but I think I’ll take tomorrow off keep him home”

Bonnie nodded and stripped the bed, handing the sheets to Harry “I’ll give you these then” she smiled and lead Harry out of the room.

“I’m going to keep him home tomorrow” Harry said to Margaret, who was the room leader, as he walked out, and she nodded at him.

“Good idea, we’ll see you next week then” Margaret said and handed Harry Oli’s bag “enjoy watching him get escorted out” she laughed

“Oh I will” he laughed quietly, aware that Oli was still sleeping on his shoulder.

Harry walked out of the babies room as the Police were being greeted by Clara.

“How long has he been here?” one of the officers asked, taking his notepad out.

“Only about half an hour, he came in and went straight into our under two’s room, and asked to pick up one of the children”

“And what did your staff do at that point? - We need this information in case the parents of the child want to take him to court.” the officer had already taken down some notes and Harry stood in the corner watching on, subtly taking a seat in one of the arm chairs and searching through Oli’s bag, making sure itchy was in there.

“They asked him to stay in the locker room away from the children, and checked our files to see if he was on the contact list for the child, when he wasn’t, he was asked to leave, and we contacted his legal guardian”

“Perfect” the officer said “so the parents are aware of this happening?”

“Yes” clara nodded “Mr Styles, his legal guardian, is here now to collect him”

“Hello” Harry interrupted, standing up from his chair.

“Oh Harry” Clara laughed “I didn’t see you come out of there- little angel still sleeping?” she smiled at Oli who was snoring on Harry’s shoulder

“He’s impossible to wake” Harry smiled

“Mr Styles” the officer said “Officer Bentley” he held out his hand and Harry shook it , “you mind if I ask a few questions about the court order you and your wife have against Mr Watts?”  

“Of course” Harry shifted Oli gently in his arms

“I’m sorry to interrupt” Clara said before the officer had a chance to take ask harry a question “but do you mind if we take this into the staff room, we quite often get parents coming to pick their children up around this time, and I’d like to make sure Harry has as much privacy with all of this as possible”

“You lead the way” Officer Bentley smiled, closing his notepad. Clara led them both down the hallway into a room filled with sofas and a large white table where Harry sat across from the officer, shifting Oli so that he could sleep on Harry’s chest.

“All the staff have had their breaks, so you won’t be interrupted”

“Thanks” Harry smiled

“I’m assuming you want this on record Mr Styles?” Bentley said as Clara closed the door behind her.

“I would, yes”

“Alright” he nodded and took out his notepad again “because he never left the premises with your child, we can’t press any charges, but we can make record of it”

“Great” Harry said, trying to keep his voice down

“My colleague is talking to Mr Watts briefly before we escort him away, but I’d just like to get some information from you about the court order, so could you tell what that says about your relationship to, Oliver?”

“Until he’s two I’m his step father, I have parental responsibility and myself and my wife have full custody”

“And what happens when he turns two?”

“Mr Watts is able to file for parental responsibility, and if a judge can see that he has improved his situation it will be granted, if he doesn’t file, or his request is denied, then I am able to adopt him”

Bentley took notes as Harry spoke “and how old is oliver now?” he asked

“18 months”

“And does the court order say anything about visitation within those two years?”

“He’s not allowed any contact” Harry said flatly and officer bentley drew his lips into a sharp line.

“Well unfortunately, because the staff here have done such a good job at keeping your son safe, he’s not technically in violation of the order because no contact was made, but the attempt will be noted and brought to the attention of the judge when and if he files in the next six months”

“Great” Harry said “Thanks for your help”

“My pleasure Mr Styles” he smiled at Harry and stood up “Now, would you like the pleasure of watching him escorted off the premises?”

“Absolutely” Harry said, with a cheeky grin spreading across his face and he stood up, again careful not to wake Oli. Bentley lead harry from the staff room and into the main foyer where his colleague was standing with Danny, holding on tightly to his arm.

“Mr Watts” Bentley said “We’re going to go now, and you’re not going to make a fuss or we will arrest you for being on private property”

Oli stirred in Harry’s arms, blinking his eyes open while Harry watched Danny shrug his shoulders and walk quietly out of the centre, with both officers holding onto him.

“Hi little man” Harry cooed quietly so that Danny wouldn’t hear him and cause a scene realising that Oli was awake. Oli lifted his had from Harry’s chest and looked around the room, waking up a little confused and Harry shifted him onto his hip so that he could see what was happening around him.

“Oli wave bye bye?” Harry asked in a soothing tone, waving his hand to show Oli what to do.

“Bye Bye” Oli said softly, waving his hand at Danny.

“Hi Sir” she said “can I help you?”

“Yes, I’m here to pick up Oliver”

She looked him up and down sternly, “Oliver’s mum said his dad would be picking him up this afternoon”

A smile spread across Danny’s face “I’m his dad” he said proudly

[[MORE]]

The lady grew even more confused with that statement “I’ve met Oliver’s dad before sir, are you on his contact list?” She finished putting things in bags and turned to face Danny directly

“I should be” he lied, knowing perfectly well that he wasn’t

“Ok, I’ll just check that before I take you through” she smiled “what’s your name?”

“Daniel Watts”

She frowned not recognising the name “I’ll have to ask you to wait here while I check” she turned around and exited the room, making her way towards the play room where they kept the information of all the children’s contacts in an easily accessible file.

“What’s going on?” Sarah, one of the other educators asked

“Oli’s real dad is here and I’m not sure y/n or Harry know anything about it” Margaret grimaced

“I’m sure they have a court order against him” Bonnie added

Margaret read down Oli’s list of contacts seeing only yourself, Harry and Gemma on there.

“Well he’s not in the list” she frowned and looked around the room for oli “where is oli?” She asked the two other girls

“He’s still asleep” Bonnie added

“Ok, can you keep an eye on him while I go and talk to this man, and Sarah, do you mind giving y/n a call and telling her what’s going on?”

They both nodded and Margaret handed Sarah the contact list so that she could find your number

“Ok, call Harry then, but first call out to reception and let Clara know what going on so she can give me a hand, I have a feeling he won’t leave easily”

Clara was the manager of the centre and was the best person to turn to in these situations, so Sarah dialled the extension that connected to the front office and asked Clara to come into the babies room to help out. Once she’s done that, Margaret went back out into the locker room to confront him.

“Mr Watts” she smiled, closing the door behind her “I’m afraid you’re not on Oliver’s contact list, so I can’t let you take him today”

“That’s bullshit” he yelled “he’s my son”

“I’ll ask that you keep your voice down sir, we have babies that are still asleep” Clara said walking into the room.

“He’s my son and I won’t be leaving without him” Danny said firmly

“We have one of other staff  members on the phone to his dad-”

“Step-dad” Danny interrupted

Margaret drew her lips into a sharp line “if he doesn’t give the ok for you to take oli than I will have to ask you to leave”

“I will not be leaving, that prick has no right to my son”

“Mr Watts” Clara said, making him focus on her “I’m going to ask that you step into my office, while we wait for Mr Styles to be contacted, I can’t have you waiting here like this”

“Mr Styles” he said with fire in his voice “has no right to be contacted”

“According to our files, Mr Styles is Oliver’s legal guardian, there’s a note in his file that says you have no legal rights to to him, so while we’re on the in the phone to his legal guardian I’ll ask that  you step  outside” Clara said ushering him out the door. He obliged, knowing that she had every right to have him removed from the premises if he didn’t do as he was asked.

***

“Hello” Harry said into the his phone as he ducked out of the studio

“Hi Harry, it’s Sarah here from Oliver’s nursery”

“Hi Sarah, is everything ok?”

“Oli’s fine, he’s still having his nap, but we’re having a situation here”

“Okayyy” Harry said confused “what’s going on?”

“We have a Mr Daniel Watts here, trying to to pick Oli up, we haven’t allowed him into the play room, but he’s refusing to leave”

“Shit” he said with a sense of urgency in his voice “he’s Oli’s biological dad, but he we’ve got a court order against him, he’s not allowed any contact”

“That’s what we thought”

“I’ll come in and get Oli”

“Alright, we’ll try and wake him up, thank you Harry”

“No problem, see you soon” he hung up the phone and quickly walked back to the studio to get his things.

“I have to go” he said darkly, unable to focus on anything else. He trusted the nursery to keep Oli safe, but he didn’t trust Danny to leave before he got his way. The car was parked in a side street a block away but the nursery was a block away in the other direction, so he lifted his hoodie up over his head and began jogging toward his sons school. At this point, he was glad that he’d been training hard in the gym, and as the nursery appeared in view he slowed down to a walk, composing himself before he walked him.

“Mr Styles” Clara said with a smile on her face “thank you for coming on such short notice”

“No problem” he smiled back

“Mr Watts is in my office if you’d like to speak to him.”

Harry could tell by the tone of her voice that she needed the extra help to try and get him to leave.

“Of course” he followed her into the office, thinking that it would be best to talk to him without Oli around.

“Harry” Danny said, taking a step toward him

“Mr Watts” Harry said, reaching out to shake his hand, meeting his eyes with a sharp stare “What are you doing here?”

“I’m here to pick up my son”

“He’s not your son until he’s two and you file for parental rights again, and I don’t believe this little incident will look good on your record, and trust me” Harry smirked “it will be on your record, because as soon as I get Oli home I’ll be calling my lawyers”

“Once he turns two they’ll have no choice but to grant me parental rights” Danny added in a snarky tone

“Mr Watts,” Clara interpreted the two of them, aware of the commotion it was causing “since Mr Styles here has made it clear that you are not legally allowed contact with Oliver, I’m going to have to ask you to leave the premises”

“I’m not going until I see my son” Danny stood his ground.

“Well I’ll have to call the police then” she picked up the phone and dialled the number of the local police, watching as Danny remained still in his place. Harry shook his head at the idiocy Danny was displaying, but remained quietly hopeful that it would mean that He would be able to officially adopt Oli sooner than he thought.

“They’re on their way to escort you off the premises” Clara said hanging up the phone and walked towards the door, ushering Harry out as she left Danny standing frozen in his spot.

“Thank you” Harry said as she closed the door behind her

“No problem Harry” she smiled and rested her hand on his shoulder “it’s my job, you go get your son”

He nodded “I’ll stick around until the police get here, in case he causes anymore trouble” he smirked “and so I can watch him get escorted away”

She laughed “I’ll keep you posted, they said they’d only be about five minutes”

Harry nodded and turned and walked into the babies room to find Margaret and Sarah gathered around the door, trying to eavesdrop on what was going on.

“Hello ladies” Harry said, cheeky smile spread across his face

“Hi Harry” Margaret said “everything ok out there?”

“Yep, police are on their way to escort him away from the area”

“Police!?” Thats intense” Sarah said, sounding concerned

“He’s refusing to leave” Harry shrugged “not the best idea if you ask me, our court order runs out when ol turns two and he can file again, but with attempted kidnaping to his name that’s not going to end well.” Now that he knew that Oli was safe, Harry found the whole situation quite funny.

“Oli’s better off with you, we can all testify to that” Margaret said

“Thanks” Harry smiled “where is the little man?”

“Bonnie’s still trying to wake up” Sarah gestured towards the room where he was still sleeping soundly.

“Can I go into the cot room?” Harry asked

Margaret checked the chart outside the door “Of course, but there’s a few others in there, so keep it down, we need them to sleep longer” she smiled

Harry slid the door open and saw Bonnie gently trying to wake Oliver from his sleep.

“He’s hard to wake” Harry said softly, walking towards his cot “Oli,” he cooed “daddy’s here to take you home”

He stirred slightly at the sound of Harry’s voice, but remained asleep. Not wanting to miss Danny being escorted away, Harry took down the side of the cot and gently lifted him up into his arms, allowing him to rest his head on his shoulder and remain asleep.

“Is he back tomorrow?” Bonnie asked before she took the sheets from his bed

“Normally yes” Harry said softly “but I think I’ll take tomorrow off keep him home”

Bonnie nodded and stripped the bed, handing the sheets to Harry “I’ll give you these then” she smiled and lead Harry out of the room.

“I’m going to keep him home tomorrow” Harry said to Margaret, who was the room leader, as he walked out, and she nodded at him.

“Good idea, we’ll see you next week then” Margaret said and handed Harry Oli’s bag “enjoy watching him get escorted out” she laughed

“Oh I will” he laughed quietly, aware that Oli was still sleeping on his shoulder.

Harry walked out of the babies room as the Police were being greeted by Clara.

“How long has he been here?” one of the officers asked, taking his notepad out.

“Only about half an hour, he came in and went straight into our under two’s room, and asked to pick up one of the children”

“And what did your staff do at that point? - We need this information in case the parents of the child want to take him to court.” the officer had already taken down some notes and Harry stood in the corner watching on, subtly taking a seat in one of the arm chairs and searching through Oli’s bag, making sure itchy was in there.

“They asked him to stay in the locker room away from the children, and checked our files to see if he was on the contact list for the child, when he wasn’t, he was asked to leave, and we contacted his legal guardian”

“Perfect” the officer said “so the parents are aware of this happening?”

“Yes” clara nodded “Mr Styles, his legal guardian, is here now to collect him”

“Hello” Harry interrupted, standing up from his chair.

“Oh Harry” Clara laughed “I didn’t see you come out of there- little angel still sleeping?” she smiled at Oli who was snoring on Harry’s shoulder

“He’s impossible to wake” Harry smiled

“Mr Styles” the officer said “Officer Bentley” he held out his hand and Harry shook it , “you mind if I ask a few questions about the court order you and your wife have against Mr Watts?”  

“Of course” Harry shifted Oli gently in his arms

“I’m sorry to interrupt” Clara said before the officer had a chance to take ask harry a question “but do you mind if we take this into the staff room, we quite often get parents coming to pick their children up around this time, and I’d like to make sure Harry has as much privacy with all of this as possible”

“You lead the way” Officer Bentley smiled, closing his notepad. Clara led them both down the hallway into a room filled with sofas and a large white table where Harry sat across from the officer, shifting Oli so that he could sleep on Harry’s chest.

“All the staff have had their breaks, so you won’t be interrupted”

“Thanks” Harry smiled

“I’m assuming you want this on record Mr Styles?” Bentley said as Clara closed the door behind her.

“I would, yes”

“Alright” he nodded and took out his notepad again “because he never left the premises with your child, we can’t press any charges, but we can make record of it”

“Great” Harry said, trying to keep his voice down

“My colleague is talking to Mr Watts briefly before we escort him away, but I’d just like to get some information from you about the court order, so could you tell what that says about your relationship to, Oliver?”

“Until he’s two I’m his step father, I have parental responsibility and myself and my wife have full custody”

“And what happens when he turns two?”

“Mr Watts is able to file for parental responsibility, and if a judge can see that he has improved his situation it will be granted, if he doesn’t file, or his request is denied, then I am able to adopt him”

Bentley took notes as Harry spoke “and how old is oliver now?” he asked

“18 months”

“And does the court order say anything about visitation within those two years?”

“He’s not allowed any contact” Harry said flatly and officer bentley drew his lips into a sharp line.

“Well unfortunately, because the staff here have done such a good job at keeping your son safe, he’s not technically in violation of the order because no contact was made, but the attempt will be noted and brought to the attention of the judge when and if he files in the next six months”

“Great” Harry said “Thanks for your help”

“My pleasure Mr Styles” he smiled at Harry and stood up “Now, would you like the pleasure of watching him escorted off the premises?”

“Absolutely” Harry said, with a cheeky grin spreading across his face and he stood up, again careful not to wake Oli. Bentley lead harry from the staff room and into the main foyer where his colleague was standing with Danny, holding on tightly to his arm.

“Mr Watts” Bentley said “We’re going to go now, and you’re not going to make a fuss or we will arrest you for being on private property”

Oli stirred in Harry’s arms, blinking his eyes open while Harry watched Danny shrug his shoulders and walk quietly out of the centre, with both officers holding onto him.

“Hi little man” Harry cooed quietly so that Danny wouldn’t hear him and cause a scene realising that Oli was awake. Oli lifted his had from Harry’s chest and looked around the room, waking up a little confused and Harry shifted him onto his hip so that he could see what was happening around him.

“Oli wave bye bye?” Harry asked in a soothing tone, waving his hand to show Oli what to do.

“Bye Bye” Oli said softly, waving his hand at Danny.

body:
Not Important. Final.

In which Harry missed an Important event of Y/N’s.

read part 1.

He was tired, broken, sleepy, you name it. He kept on thinking how he fucked up so bad, knowing he’s all the reason behind this madness. Many hours staring at the ceiling, thinking of a way to fix this problem.

But, he knew, this can’t be fixed by anything.

His show is in 5 hours, and he didn’t went into any soundchecks, meeting or anything related with it. He wasn’t prepared, he’s still on his bed, hugging your pillow with a little bit of scent now.

He missed you, the way you always giggle whenever he kiss you goodnight, your hugs and touches are all to die for. The arousing scent of your hair were ghosting over his nose as he pressed himself harder at your pillow.

You left his house the second you exit the venue, you didn’t thought about it, you just made your decision right there. The madness took over you and did the wrong thing.

His thoughts were interrupted when he heard his phone going off, still wishing it’s Y/N, but he knew, she could never call him again, she blocked him on everything.

He looked at the caller ID and saw it was Jeff, he groaned, a little bit pissed at him knowing that he was the one who didn’t checked and kept on track on time. After a few rings, Harry finally picked up, not saying anything.

“Harry, mat—“

“Don’t ‘Mate’ me after what you just did.” He rolled his eyes, his voice were raspy, cracking and deep because of his screams when the minute he knew you left him. He heard him sigh and went silent for a little while.

“I got this, I’ll explain the truth, I promise you.”

Harry rolled his eyes. Despite everything’s that has been happening, he still thought about his fans, he couldn’t cancel them, they paid so hard to get in, and he couldn’t just think about himself.

-

Harry sat alone in his dressing room, looking at the ground completely distracted. He couldn’t stop thinking about you, how you broke down in front of him, and how you explained your feelings towards him. It hurts him.

“Harry? Come on now, it’s about to start.” Clare’s voice were heard behind the door. He looked at it, unsure if he’s still gonna continue this.

But, he will, for his fans.

Clare looked at him in pity, she knows what happened since Harry always share his stories with her. She wrapped her arm around his waist and gave him a smile, which he returned and put his arm around her shoulders.

“You okay?” She asked while they’re walking together towards backstage.

Harry sighed, he didn’t know how to answer or how to answer her question. Even him doesn’t know what he’s feeling right now.

“I’m trying my best.” He gave her a reassuring smile.

“Okay then, let’s sing, rockstar.”

-

The fans’ faces were pure of worries as they noticed that Harry wasn’t smiling or laughing anymore. It bothered him, he want to do the same old things he used to do, but he can’t. He can’t find the motivation to keep him happy or enegerized.

His dances were minimum, he wasn’t groovy like he used to be. The way he talks to fans were short and simple, he would just place the flag on his mic stand and not wave it around on stage.

“I dedicate this song to a very special person in my life. Please sing it with me, this is sweet creature.” He loved singing it to you whenever you are stressed, busy or tired. It was also your favorite song of his album, so it was special for him.

He wished that you were there to watch him play, and keep him motivated.

And you were.

Jeff explained everything when you woke up, knowing that he was the one who kept Harry late in the bar. You knew it was his show today, so you didn’t bother showing yourself to him since you asked help from his team to lead you in a hidden place.

You were still proud at your sight, but also sad seeing him very down, blue and hopeless. You were a crying mess when you heard him singing your favorite song of his, it never grows old whenever he’s singing it. You missed every piece of him, everything about him is being missed by you.

Harry didn’t run, but walked fastly towards the backstage so he can go back to his dressing room. He stopped his tracks when he smelled a familiar scent of someone, his heart beat was beating too fast when he was realizing who it was.

He prayed it was you.

And it was.

He almost dropped his knees at the sight of you, sitting on one of the chairs on the room. Your hair was messy, you wore simple clothes, no make up at all. He loved that kind of Y/N, bare and simple, he couldn’t get tired seeing it everyday.

“Jeff told me.” You whispered. Your voice wasn’t the same old happy and jolly like you used to, and it bothered him. Your voice is his favorite in you. He looked at the ground, not answering anything, but he knew he need to say something.

“I’m sorry.” He croaked out.

He heard you sigh, and stood up from your seat.

“It’s not your fault anyways.” Harry’s ears lit up from your words, he wanted you to know that it wasn’t his intention to miss your event.

“I really didn’t mean miss your event, I swear to God.” Harry grabbed your hands, he took a shaky breathe as he felt how cold it was. You nodded, looking at the ground. You were still not sure if you could trust him. Breaking his promise is the least thing you wanted him to do, but still, he did it.

“D’you still love me?” He whispered.

“How could I love you again, if I don’t even know if I still trust you?”

Your words were like knife stabbing on his chest, he don’t know how or what to answer that. He understands completely how hard it is for you to love him again, and it wasn’t an easy favor for you to do.

You want to love him again. You really want to.

“I’m really sorry, I want you to know that.” His voice were always breaking in every words he says. You sighed finally looking at him, you loved seeing his face, the structures and features of it are keeping you safe and contented.

“I really want to trust you again, I do, but I don’t know anymore. I don’t know what to believe.” You finally said, earning a small sigh from him, he looked at his side, blinking away some tears and sniffed a little. You suddenly felt that he’s very sincere in everything he said.

“I don’t want to give up on us.”

“What if you need to?”

Those 5 words made him drop into his knees, completely defeated by it. You gasped into his actions and quickly kneeled beside him, you went over to grab his hands, and gave him some reassuring words.

“Fuck, couldn’t even see myself saying that to you.”

Your eyes teared up a bit, at the view you were seeing. You just want to see his daily smile whenever you spend some time with him, you want this fight to end.

“Just don’t state promises that you can’t keep.”

Harry’s heart started to beat fast as he looked at you. His hands were shaking, he would do anything for him to fix this problem.

You both were silent for a while, until you let out a smile, Harry was about to return it, but it was replaced by a bigger one once he saw you opening your arms, it was a sign that he knows that you guys are finally okay.

You laughed as he crashed his body into yours, his hold was completely tight, but he still tried to keep it comfortable for you. You didn’t bother anything, you want to bring him back into your life, you love him.

“I love you, so so much.” He murmured against your neck, you felt water were coming down to his cheeks making your heart flutter in happiness. The room was filled with cries, and broken voices, but it’s now replaced by laughters and joy voices.

Harry couldn’t asked for anything else, he just wants to be with the person he loves and nobody else.

“I’ll always be on your side, I promise you.”

question: H and the missus at home and H going ‘love, where’s my suit?’ and missus just freezing so H gets worried and is all ‘u alright ?’ then the missus just screams ‘hONEY, WHERE IS MY SUPERSUIT’ so now H just shakes his head because this. this is the woman he married.
answer:
GOD AM I IN LOVE WITH THIS

and harry would be just shocked at it for awhile but he isn’t even surprised at the slightest bit.

he’ll chuckle for sure and would throw his head back, just wrapping his hand around your wrist to bring you up the stairs and he mutters something in his breath and it’s immediately heard by you, a squeal from your lips he’s sure that he wouldn’t forget.

“swear to god m’gonna rent you disneyland for the whole day — would even treat you to every single thing they have; married you, so i signed up for this in the first place too.”

summary: Imagine sitting in shirtless Harry's lap sketching his tattoos in your sketchbook on a rainy while while he looks at you like...
question: Imagine sitting in shirtless Harry's lap sketching his tattoos in your sketchbook on a rainy while while he looks at you like you're the sun and moon and all the stars😍
answer:
I-wow..so attacked:’)))

You’re snuggled with his sweater, legs stretched on the couch in front of you and Harry’s stretched beside yours. He’s shirtless after a cuddle session with only depending on body heat to warm up. His head is leaning on the couch and eyes fixed on you with a smile he didn’t know was on his lips.
He’s slowly and gently tracing figures on your legs, the light from the fire place is the only light in the room and beside the sound of cackling fire and pitter patter of rain, Harry would hum every now and then and tuck himself into the couch more.

“Want to see?” You’d gently and so softly ask that it’d make it possible for him to melt. His head shoots up and he nods, reaching his hand out for you.
You place the sketchpad on his palm and watch as he brings it closer to him and looks at it. His smile only widens and his other hand moves to trace the sketches you’ve been doing for the past 2 hours. It was almost as if he was a stranger to his own tattoos because looking at what you drew, he has never seen his tattoos like that; like you gave each tattoo a new meaning.

He puts the sketchpad on the table and places his body on yours that led you to squeal from surprise and giggle, Harry’s heart fluttering. He manages to lie beside you – you inside and him outside so if anyone falls from the small space, it’s him – and wraps his arms around you and nuzzles his face in your neck before pressing a kiss to your skin, “Want to tattoo you on my skin, baby,” He whispered, moving to peck your nose, grinning when you scrunch it and move your hand to his hair, “And have you with me everywhere I go.”

You hum, blush hidden by the dimmed light as your lips graze his, “I love you.”

If anything can make Harry happier and relaxed to an extreme extent, it was you telling him that you love him. Your “I love you” was always enough.

“And I love you,” He says it so softly as he peppers soft pecks on your lips, “Love you so much.”
